node.title: Driver, 60, weeps as he is jailed for crash that killed mother and son
node.alt: A smiling mother with a young boy
node.description: Michael Knowler will serve less than two years in prison after pleading guilty to causing a crash that killed Jessica West and her son Deighton in 2019.
node.content:
["A 60-year-old\u00a0man who pleaded guilty to causing the deaths of a Bendigo mother and her young son has been sentenced to two-and-a-half years\u00a0behind bars.", "Victoria's County Court heard New Zealand-born Michael Knowler's prime mover ploughed into a car carrying the West family near Ballarat, in December 2019.", "In the car were 37-year-old Jessica West and her son, five-year-old Deighton, as well as her husband Anthony and oldest son Oakley.", "Anthony and Oakley West were the only two survivors, although the young boy suffered multiple injuries,\u00a0including a severe traumatic brain injury.", "Knowler, who is from WA, pleaded guilty to\u00a0driving dangerously causing death during a pre-sentence hearing in February this year, as well as causing serious injury to Oakley West.", "", "
Five-year-old Deighton West was killed and his brother Oakley suffered traumatic brain injuries.(Facebook)
", "The West family had been driving from Bendigo to visit Jessica's parents in Ballarat when the truck crashed into their car at an intersection, near Creswick.", "The car flipped several times before landing on its roof.", "Knowler had failed to stop at a give-way sign while driving to Daylesford to visit a friend, the court heard.", "The court heard the driver was distracted by a GPS on his phone at the time of the incident, but was not speeding, and was not under the influence of drugs or alcohol.", "He acknowledged to police after the incident, he had seen a give-way\u00a0sign.", "
'Genuinely remorseful'
", "In a previous hearing Anthony West spoke of the grief and heartbreak after the incident \u2013 saying '\"not a day goes by\"\u00a0that he doesn't think about the accident.", "The 60-year old wept in court as victim impact statements were mentioned by Judge George Georgiou.", "\u00a0\"I accept you are genuinely remorseful,\" Judge Georgiou said.", "Knowler was sentenced to 31 months in prison, with 316 days imprisonment acting as time served. He has been disqualified from driving for 18 months.\u00a0"]
